name: SENTINEL (itch) (rbnturner)
description:
Sentinel is a top-down twin stick shooter made solo in 48 hours for the GMTK20 game jam in Unity.

Gameplay

You have 4 minutes to protect the pilgrims from those who seek to destroy them. Scoring is based upon killing enemies and escorting pilgrims. Score multiplier is applied based upon pilgrims saved and shields retained. So use them wisely.

Controls

Controller only at the moment sorry!

Move (LEFT STICK)
AIM/SHOOT (RIGHT STICK)
SHIELD (X)
QUIT (START)

Audio

None, sorry :(

Bugs and spelin mistakes

Probably lots!

Web player build

Hit a nasty build bug at 19:45, so only a windows version is available at the moment.

Future

I might continue on with development of the game, but for now I think I'll sleep.
